attribute_data.name: Connected
attribute_data.description: Character has ties to a powerful organization (corporation, government, crime syndicate, etc.) and can access resources and privileges.

levels.4: Local Authority (e.g. captain, knight with land)

user_input_required.label: Organization or Individual Connected To
user_input_required.description: Name the organization, faction, or individual the character is connected to.

attribute_data.name: Energised
attribute_data.description: Increases total Energy Points (EP) by 10 per level. Can be modified with Limiters to create a secondary conditional EP pool.

attribute_data.name: Features
attribute_data.description: The character possesses various minor abilities or qualities that grant useful but secondary advantages. Can be personal, racial, or technological in nature. These are typically flavor or small utility traits.

user_input_required.label: Feature Type
user_input_required.description: Select the general type of feature.

user_input_required.label: Features List
user_input_required.description: Enter one or more features (select from suggestions or write your own).

attribute_data.name: Heightened Awareness
attribute_data.description: Grants a bonus on rolls to notice nearby hidden objects or ambushes.

attribute_data.name: Mulligan
attribute_data.description: Allows a character to reroll all dice for an action. You may choose from any result (original or rerolled).

attribute_data.name: Skill Group: Occupation (Background)
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.name: Unknown Power
attribute_data.description: Represents hidden or mysterious abilities not known to the character. The GM allocates Attributes equal to CP spent + 50% bonus, which manifest during play.

defect_data.name: Magnet
defect_data.description: Character attracts obsessive or amorous attention from others. This is not due to charisma, but some unseen fate or aura. Attention is usually unwanted and problematic.

attribute_data.name: Cognition
attribute_data.description: Grants either Precognition (future visions) or Postcognition (visions of the past). Chosen at creation. Scope is limited by the GM.

levels.1: See a few seconds ahead / 1 minute past

attribute_data.name: Skill Group: Business (Field)
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.name: Skill Group: Social (Field)
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.name: Skill Group: Street (Field)
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.name: Skill Group: Technical (Field)
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.user_description: Technical knowledge of items and artifacts

attribute_data.name: Dynamic Powers
attribute_data.description: Gives story-driven power over a specific concept, natural force, or influence. Choose a category type and define what your character controls. Must be discussed with the GM.

user_input_required.label: Category Type
user_input_required.description: Select the scope of influence your character has.

user_input_required.label: Controlled Category
user_input_required.description: Enter the specific category your character controls.

Minor: Having the Right Amount of Money

attribute_data.name: Energised
attribute_data.description: Increases total Energy Points (EP) by 10 per level. Can be modified with Limiters to create a secondary conditional EP pool.

attribute_data.name: Flight
attribute_data.description: Allows the character to fly through an atmosphere using any method such as wings, magic, or anti-gravity.

levels.1: Fly at speeds up to 10 kph
levels.2: Fly at speeds up to 30 kph
levels.3: Fly at speeds up to 100 kph
levels.4: Fly at speeds up to 300 kph
levels.5: Fly at speeds up to 1,000 kph
levels.6: Fly at speeds up to 3,000 kph

attribute_data.name: Sixth Sense
attribute_data.description: Allows character to sense phenomena others cannot, such as emotions, magic, danger.

attribute_data.name: Skill Group
attribute_data.description: Represents training or natural talent in a broad skill field. Skill Groups are divided into Background, Field, and Action categories, each with a different cost per level. Each Skill Group is treated as a separate Attribute.

levels.1: Developing - Gaining proficiency through regular application
levels.6: Grand Master - Unparalleled ability and knowledge

attribute_data.name: Special Movement
attribute_data.description: Grants unique movement types such as Wall-Crawling, Zen Direction, Swinging, or Water-Walking. Some types count as two abilities due to enhanced utility.

user_input_required.label: Movement Types
user_input_required.description: List the Special Movement abilities the character possesses.
